title: DevOps Associate
description: Maintaining global edge networks. Matches your Docker/C++ skills but shifts focus to Infra.
match_reason: The candidate has 2 years of frontend/backend experience but lacks in DevOps and networking skills. Although Docker is listed as a skill, it's not ranked high. Achievements are impressive, but they don't directly align with DevOps roles. Difficulty in relocation due to no visa and immediate notice period. Eligible for company (Cloudflare) and minimum salary (95000), but relocation to the United States is not a preference.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Leading design sprints and creating high-fidelity wireframes.
match_reason: The candidate has a mismatch with the job requirements. Their technical skills and role experience are in frontend development and backend development, whereas the job requires UI/UX design skills (Figma, User Research, Prototyping). Although they have experience in React and Node.js, it does not translate to UI/UX design skills. They have a strong educational background, but it does not align with the job requirements. Their experience in competitive programming and hackathons is impressive, but it also does not directly relate to the job at hand. Their preferences for 'workMode' and 'companyPreference' are not aligned with the job, and their salary requirement is also not met by the job offer.
